body_html: @fritzo I find myself using a lot of diagonal normal distributions in my work. For me it's just cleaner and communicates intent more clearly to write MultivariateNormalDiag instead of Independent(Normal(...), 1). Right now I've just written a function MultivariateNormalDiag that calls Independent(Normal(...), 1).

body: @fritzo I find myself using a lot of diagonal normal distributions in my work.
